data.title: Capital Area District Libraries
data.text: MeLCat requesting and some access to MeL eResources will be down for a server upgrade July 23 and 24. During the downtime, you will still be able to check out MeL items on the holdshelf but check-ins will be delayed. This upgrade impacts all MeLCat libraries statewide. This means you may experience a slight delay in receiving items requested immediately prior to the disruption.
